errors.auth/invalid-display-name: The provided value for the displayName user property is invalid. It must be a non-empty string.
errors.auth/email-already-in-use: The provided email is already in use by an existing user.
errors.auth/invalid-email: The provided value for the email user property is invalid. It must be a string email address.
errors.auth/password-missing: To set an e-mail address you also need to provide a password.
errors.auth/current-password-missing: To update your profile please provide your current password.
errors.auth/weak-password: The provided value for the password user property is invalid. It must be a string with at least six characters.

en.title: Profile Settings
en.description: Add a description that will be shown when you host a session

errors.auth/invalid-display-name: O valor escolhido para o teu nome é inválido.
errors.auth/invalid-email: O valor escolhido para o teu email é inválido. Tem de ser um formato válido de email.
errors.auth/password-missing: Para configurar em endereço de email também tens de definir uma palavra passe.
errors.auth/weak-password: Palavra passe inválida. Tem de ter pelo menos 6 carateres.
errors.auth/current-password-missing: Para alterares o teu perfil por favor indica a tua palavra passe atual.
errors.auth/wrong-password: Palavra passe inválida, por favor tenta outra vez.

errors.auth/invalid-display-name: The provided value for the displayName user property is invalid. It must be a non-empty string.
errors.auth/email-already-in-use: Den här email-adressen är redan kopplat till ett konto.
errors.auth/password-missing: För att spara email-adressen behöver du också välja ett lösenord.
errors.auth/current-password-missing: För att uppdatera din profil, skriv in ditt nuvarande lösenord.
errors.auth/weak-password: Lösenordet måste innehålla minst sex tecken.
